channel.title: Shell on KK's Blog (fromkk)
channel.description: Recent content in Shell on KK's Blog (fromkk)

item.title: Some Useful Shell Tools
item.description: Here are some shell tools I use, which can boost your productivity. Prezto #A zsh configuration framework. Provides auto completion, prompt theme and lots of modules to work with other useful tools. I extremely love the agnoster theme. Fasd #Help you to navigate between folders and launch application.
